solution_line_template: There are {pieces_left_final}+{duck3_ate}+{duck2_ate}=<<{pieces_left_final}+{duck3_ate}+{duck2_ate}={pieces_before_first_duck_ate}>>{pieces_before_first_duck_ate} pieces of bread after the first duck ate
